participant_1.background:
I am grateful for my parents' support and encouragement.
I take time to enjoy nature and spend time with my mother.
driving in the country side is a pastime.
I love watching Gila chase the sunbeams around my living room.
i have trouble getting motivated.

participant_2.background:
I love listening to music while I eat my tuna fish salad.
I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job.
I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.
i am very familiar with hospitals and doctors.
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.

content.text: Good! I'm enjoying a nice cup of tea and reading mermaid books.
Mermaids are so cool! I love to read about them too.
Me too! I love the idea of living underwater.
Me too! It would be so peaceful and quiet.
I like to go for walks in the country side and listen to the birds sing.
That sounds so peaceful! I would love to do that sometime.
I have a dog named Gila. He's a great companion and he loves to run around in the fields.
I would love to have a dog, but I can't because of my job.
Oh, that's too bad. Dogs are so great.
I'm grateful for my parents' support and encouragement. They've always been there for me.
My parents are also great supporters. I'm so grateful for them.
I'm glad you have good parents!
